tests.title: Should create a new user
tests.fullTitle: GoRest API Testing - POST Request Should create a new user

err.message:
CypressError: `cy.request()` failed on:

https://gorest.co.in/public/v2/users

The response we received from your web server was:

  > 422: Unprocessable Entity

This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.

If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`

-----------------------------------------------------------

The request we sent was:

Method: POST
URL: https://gorest.co.in/public/v2/users
Headers: {
  "Connection": "keep-alive",
  "Authorization": "Bearer 53129796255fe40dcf0d1b94f99bfb4ee06f8a00f1e6c492ea4b307e453554c2",
  "Content-Type": "application/json",
  "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/14.4.1 Chrome/130.0.6723.137 Electron/33.2.1 Safari/537.36",
  "accept": "*/*",
  "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate",
  "content-length": 86
}
Body: {"name":"John Doe","email":"john33.doe@example.com","gender":"male","status":"active"}

-----------------------------------------------------------

The response we got was:

Status: 422 - Unprocessable Entity
Headers: {
  "date": "Tue, 17 Jun 2025 11:04:19 GMT",
  "content-type": "application/json; charset=utf-8",
  "content-length": "54",
  "connection": "keep-alive",
  "cache-control": "no-cache",
  "feature-policy": "camera 'none'; gyroscope 'none'; microphone 'none'; usb 'none'; fullscreen 'self'",
  "referrer-policy": "strict-origin-when-cross-origin",
  "vary": "Origin",
  "x-content-type-options": "nosniff",
  "x-download-options": "noopen",
  "x-frame-options": "SAMEORIGIN",
  "x-permitted-cross-domain-policies": "none",
  "x-ratelimit-limit": "90",
  "x-ratelimit-remaining": "89",
  "x-ratelimit-reset": "1",
  "x-request-id": "100b6399-f015-48fa-a7a6-1f484129c639",
  "x-runtime": "0.071686",
  "x-xss-protection": "0",
  "cf-cache-status": "DYNAMIC",
  "nel": "{\"report_to\":\"cf-nel\",\"success_fraction\":0.0,\"max_age\":604800}",
  "report-to": "{\"group\":\"cf-nel\",\"max_age\":604800,\"endpoints\":[{\"url\":\"https://a.nel.cloudflare.com/report/v4?s=28m3zfJKe2ceQaViq%2FZjdh2PibtAfv1%2BAYBL4QeQVcumpFzMtnsrFqV1s3Y5ftWHq0ctXwZd8fZPjsroXT31OIsy0eEwHhMNstDPAQ%3D%3D\"}]}",
  "server": "cloudflare",
  "cf-ray": "951210bf8dde8a1c-MRS",
  "alt-svc": "h3=\":443\"; ma=86400"
}
Body: [
  {
    "field": "email",
    "message": "has already been taken"
  }
]
